column5: We just returned from Ontario this week. Took 61 from Duluth to Thunder Bay. Big mess with the construction. Long delays, detours, rough roads. Came back a different route.
Headed that way in september what route did come back on?
We came back from Dryden area on 502 and crossed at IF

After coming home via route 61 ten days ago and reading your post we are going back up through Fort Francis next week. When we came through it (61) was just rough, slimmy, lots of traffic and delays. That's the price to be paid for good roads though.Thanks for reminding me!!Pooch
